languages.text: {n}Я слышу их шепот. Коварный, забивающий уши. Больше они не смеются с другими. Не притворствуют.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Я слышу их шепот. Коварный, забивающий уши. Больше они не смеются с другими. Не притворствуют.{/n}

languages.text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я слышу их шепот. Коварный, забивающий уши. Больше они не смеются с другими. Не притворствуют.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, Insidious and ear-clogging. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer are they pretending.{/n}
{n}I can hear their whispers, Insidious and ear-clogging. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer are they pretending.{/n}
{n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and defeaning. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

{n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and defeaning. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich höre Flüstern, hinterhältig und ohrenbetäubend. Sie lachen nicht mehr mit den anderen. Sie spielen nichts mehr vor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich höre Flüstern, hinterhältig und ohrenbetäubend. Sie lachen nicht mehr mit den anderen. Sie spielen nichts mehr vor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oigo sus susurros, virulentos y ensordecedores. Ya no se ríen con los demás. Ya no fingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oigo sus susurros, virulentos y ensordecedores. Ya no se ríen con los demás. Ya no fingen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの囁きが聞こえる。陰湿で弱々しい。もはや他の者たちとともに笑うことはない。もう、ふりをすることもない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの囁きが聞こえる。陰湿で弱々しい。もはや他の者たちとともに笑うことはない。もう、ふりをすることもない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我听到了他们阴险的窃窃私语，充满了蔑视的意味。他们已经不再和其他人一起哈哈大笑，也不再继续伪装。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我听到了他们阴险的窃窃私语，充满了蔑视的意味。他们已经不再和其他人一起哈哈大笑，也不再继续伪装。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je peux entendre leurs murmures insidieux et assourdissants. Ils ne rient plus avec les autres. Ils ne font plus semblant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je peux entendre leurs murmures insidieux et assourdissants. Ils ne rient plus avec les autres. Ils ne font plus semblant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kulakları sağır eden, sinsi fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum. Artık diğerlerinin kahkahalarına eşlik etmiyorlar. Artık rol yapmıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I can hear their whispers, insidious and deafening. No longer do they laugh with the others. No longer do they pretend.{/n}
